column1: Itagüí is governed by a democratic system based on administrative decentralization processes generated from the proclamation of the Colombian Constitution of 1991. The city is governed by a mayor (executive) and a Municipal Council (legislative power).

Itagüí is home to a football (soccer) team called Itagüí F.C. which plays in the Colombian first division. The team plays in the Metropolitan Stadium City Itagüí (in Spanish Estadio Metropolitano Ciudad de Itagüí). The city also has an Itagüí Coliseum where soccer practice.
